name: Thaives.github.io
body:
### Objective
    * Graduated in Information Technology in Vietnam, 2004.
    * Worked at Vietnam Electronic Service and Computer Corporation 
      and had taught for 3 years before came to the U.S, 2008.
    * Like to work with computer, interested in Network and Programming.

### Education
    * Information Technology, Bachelor of Science
      Software Development Concentration		
      Georgia Gwinnett College - Lawrenceville, GA

### Work Experience
    * GAINESVILLE FIRST BAPTIST CHURCH, Computer Technician                                     
      July. 2009 – Present
        • Create and run slideshows for people in church.
        • Maintained and fixed computers and other devices.

    * NETWORK ENHANCED TECHNOLOGIES, Agent                                       
      Sep. 2010 – Present
        • Provide all services about mobile phone.
    * GEORGIA GWINNETT COLLEGE
      Jan. 2010 - Present
        • Research on Auto Assessment.
        • Team project to develope Android App: GGC-Connect

### Skills (Technical)
    * Programming language: Java, Visual Basic.
    * Database: MS. SQL, Oracle 11g.
    * Script language: Git Bash, Shell.

### References
    * Rev. Joe Tu
      Associate Pastor at First Baptist Church in Gainesville.
      Phone: 706 968 8221
